meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Andrea Massar Norah McKissic Rhea Hantelman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6700.

td.p: Andrea Massar, a clinical social worker from Rockville, Maryland
Norah McKissic, an embroiderer and student from Anchorage, Alaska
Rhea Hantelman, an administrative assistant from Marysville, Washington (whose 1-day cash winnings total $25,000)

tr.td: ALSO A CLASSIC MONOPOLY SPACE

td.a: THE NEW YORK TIMES PULITZER WINNERS

tr.td: GIRL GROUPS
BIRTH, SCHOOL, WORK, DEATH
WORD ORIGINS
IT'S ABOUT TIME

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Rhea] Well, they start with the same letter, but they are not neighbors.)
...
(Alex: [To Andrea] Was going for Guyana and, uh, Guatemala, but that\'s way, way away.)
...
(Alex: [To Norah] They are not neighbors, but [*] are neighbors.)
RheaWhat are Paraguay & Peru?
$7,800
AndreaWhat is Guyana
$6,201
NorahWhat Columbia & Chile
$8,000
Brazil & Bolivia')

tr.td: NATIONS OF THE WORLD
The only 2 countries in the Americas that border each other & begin with the same letter

Norah
Andrea

New champion: $11,400

Norah
